A concurrent resolution urging the establishment of a United States Commission on Truth, Racial Healing, and Transformation.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution affirms, more than 400 years after the arrival of the first slave ship, that the United States owes a debt of remembrance to those who lived through slavery or other historical injustices against people of color, as well as to their descendants. It also urges the establishment of a U.S. Commission on Truth, Racial Healing, and Transformation.
